typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Treatment_Cost as string,
		Unit_Cost as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Date as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as string,
		Budget_Area_Treated as string,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Cost as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as decimal(19,4),
		Treatment_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Last_Age_Class_Date as date,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as decimal(5,2),
		Budget_Area_Treated as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Treatment_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Unit_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOperation
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalOperation derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Operation_Type_Code,Area_Treated,Treatment_Cost,Unit_Cost,Last_Age_Class_Date,Species_Survived,Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,Budget_Area_Treated,Budget_Treatment_Cost,Budget_Unit_Cost)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Operation_Id = Operation_Id,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code,
		Relation_Area_Treated = Area_Treated,
		Relation_Treatment_Cost = Treatment_Cost,
		Relation_Unit_Cost = Unit_Cost,
		Relation_Last_Age_Class_Date = Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Relation_Species_Survived = Species_Survived,
		Relation_Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Relation_Budget_Area_Treated = Budget_Area_Treated,
		Relation_Budget_Treatment_Cost = Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Relation_Budget_Unit_Cost = Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Operation_Type_Code,Area_Treated,Treatment_Cost,Unit_Cost,Last_Age_Class_Date,Species_Survived,Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,Budget_Area_Treated,Budget_Treatment_Cost,Budget_Unit_Cost)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Operation_Id == Relation_Operation_Id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingOperation@NewOperation select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Last_Age_Class_Date = toDate(Last_Age_Class_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Operation_Id = toInteger(Operation_Id),
		Area_Treated = toDecimal(Area_Treated, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Treatment_Cost = toDecimal(Treatment_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Unit_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = toDecimal(Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate, 5, 2, "###.##"),
		Budget_Area_Treated = toDecimal(Budget_Area_Treated, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Treatment_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Treatment_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Unit_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingOperation@(NewOperation, ChangedOperation, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingOperation@ChangedOperation derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id = Relation_Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as decimal(19,4),
		Treatment_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Last_Age_Class_Date as date,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as decimal(5,2),
		Budget_Area_Treated as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Treatment_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Unit_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Operation_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
